longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports issued to nationals of the Netherlands must be
  valid on arrival. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- Unaccompanied minors, who are 17 years of age or younger,
  must hold a letter of consent from the parent/guardian.
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Netherlands will be expected
  to hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- Foreign minors who are 11 years or younger can travel
  without their own visa when . 
Additional Information:
- Nationals of the Netherlands, not born in Aruba, intending
  to stay longer than 180 days in a calendar year
   
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay, proof of hotel accommodation and documents
  required for their next destination
- Nationals of the Netherlands not born in Aruba, residing in
  Aruba, are required to prove resident status by one of the
  following:
Warning:
- Visitors must hold return/onward tickets
